title: Anaysis of data on injuries
text: Register data Norsk pasientregister (NPR) Kommunalt pasient- og brukerregister (KPR) contain information accidents injuries Norway. Nevertheless, merging two data sources straightforward process. package helps mitigate challenge.

title: Anaysis of data on injuries

what: Find similar codes for a chosen period to avoid counting similar injury more than once. Column dup with value 1 represents possibility of similar injury. The rows should be carefully evaluated or deleted ie. delete all with dup == 1 — check_codes

Count cases — count_case
text: Count injury cases episodes. Generally episode shoulde : Main diagnosis S00 T78 acute injury ie. hastegrad 1 Posibility select days previous following injury similar code multiple injuries

title: Count cases — count_case
code: count_case(   d,   period = 0,   id = "lopenr",   date.col = "innDato",   acute = FALSE,   days = 0,   diag.col = "hoveddiagnoser" )

title: Count cases — count_case
text: d Dataset contain ICD-10 diagnosis codes period Representing 4-months period ie. first, second third. Default 0 include data whole period else use 1, 2 3. id Columname representing unique id date.col Columname date filtering acute Default FALSE. Use TRUE include acute patients ie. Hastegrad = 1 days diffence days registration considered ie. person one registered injuries ICD-10 code. avoid counting similar injuries . diag.col Columname codes main diagnosis

title: Count cases — count_case
text: value arg days 0, new column called dup created ie. duplicated cases. Hence dup == 1 indicates row duplicated defined within specified days.

title: Count cases — count_case
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ dd <- count_case(dt1, period = 1:2, acute = TRUE) dd <- count_case(dt1, acute = TRUE, days = 3) } # }

title: Find cases — find_case
text: Identify cases FMDS dataset. Three possible methods used: Keep found FMDS found FMDS Somatic date health institution matched multiple registeries FMDS similar dates health institution, keep earlier date mulitple registeries FMDS date different health institutions, check Somatic data. Matching health institution kept.

title: Find cases — find_case
code: find_case(   d1,   d2,   id = "lopenr",   skade = "skadeDato",   rhf = "helseforetak_nr",   filter = NULL,   days = 3,   verbose = FALSE,   clean = FALSE )

title: Find cases — find_case
text: d1 Dataset FMDS ie. external explanation injury d2 Dataset NPR ie. intery registration injury id Unique patient identity skade Coloumn name date injury rhf Coloumn name health institutions filter Column name filtering inclusion exclusion ie. .na(filter) days selected time period consider similar injury eg. 3 days verbose Keep variables making selection ie. xx.VariableName produce DELXX clean Delete possible duplicated cases

title: Find cases — find_case
text: dataset DELXX column indicate non-cases value 1 argument clean = FALSE. verbose = TRUE output include variables needed create DELXX.

what: Find external causes for cases — find_cause
title: Find external causes for cases — find_cause
text: Identify unique external causes injury cases based FMDS dataset. Three possible methods used: Keep found FMDS, found FMDS Somatic date health institution matched multiple registries FMDS similar dates health institution identified, keep earlier based time multiple registries FMDS date different health institutions identified, check health institution Somatic data. Matching health institution kept.

title: Find external causes for cases — find_cause
code: find_cause(   d1,   d2,   id = "lopenr",   skade = "skadeDato",   rhf = "helseforetak_nr",   filter = NULL,   days = 3,   verbose = FALSE,   clean = FALSE )

title: Find external causes for cases — find_cause
text: d1 Dataset FMDS ie. external explanation injury d2 Dataset NPR ie. entry registration injury id Unique patient identity skade Coloumn name date injury rhf Coloumn name health institutions filter Column name filtering inclusion exclusion ie. .na(filter) days selected time period consider similar injury. Default 3 days verbose Keep variables making selection ie. xx.VariableName produce DELXX clean Delete possible duplicated cases

title: Find external causes for cases — find_cause
text: dataset DELXX column created indicating non-cases ie. DELXX = 1. Use argument verbose = TRUE include columns needed crating DELXX column. Argument clean = TRUE exclude DELXX == 1.

title: Find external causes for cases — find_cause

text: Select codes column consisting ICD-10 codes meet requirement injury codes ie. S00 T78

title: Get valid codes — get_valid_codes
text: d Dataset select.col Columnames dataset ICD codes controlled . Default hoveddiagnoser create.col New columnames consisting logical value indicate least one codes S00 T78 exists ie. TRUE means one codes select.col S00 T78. Default hovdiag split Symbols splitting codes multiple codes column. Default whitespace ie. " "

title: Get valid codes — get_valid_codes
text: Original column suffix *.old

what: Duplicated with different health institutions — is_rhf
title: Duplicated with different health institutions — is_rhf
text: Identify cases similar date injury different health institutions. Need check injury register identify health institutions patients registered NPR. health institution FMDS similar registered NPR (entry point) within selected time period considered double registery. Double registery marked 1 column "xx.DEL"
